metadata.title: CVE-2024-47658 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:crypto: stm32/cryp - call finalize with bh disabledThe finalize operation in interrupt mode produce a produces a spinlockrecursion warning. The reason is the fact that BH must be disabledduring this process.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
